Sentece: The plasma half-life of indecainide after acute oral administration was 3-5 hr in rats, dogs, and monkeys but considerably shorter in mice.
Title: The pharmacokinetics of indecainide in mice, rats, dogs, and monkeys.
Name: Indecainide

Sentece: The mean trough plasma level of indecainide on optimal dosage was 409 +/- 173 ng/ml and the mean plasma elimination half-life was 10.3 +/- 2.3 h (range 7.1 to 14.2).
Title: Indecainide for treatment of ventricular ectopic depolarizations: efficacy, pharmacokinetics, hemodynamic effects and safety.
Name: Indecainide
